mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAITING_RECORD A JOIN MEMBER_INFO B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) WHERE B.MEMBER_ID = #{ userId } AND A.USE_STATUS = 'complete'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAITING_RECORD A JOIN MEMBER_INFO B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) WHERE B.MEMBER_ID = #{ userId } AND A.USE_STATUS = 'cancel'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAITING_RECORD A JOIN MEMBER_INFO B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) WHERE B.MEMBER_ID = #{ userId } AND A.USE_STATUS = 'waiting' AND A.USE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT C.MEMBER_NUM , C.USE_DATE , C.COM_NO , C.RECORD_NO , D.PHONE , E.COM_NAME FROM WAITING_RECORD C JOIN MEMBER_INFO D ON(C.MEMBER_ID = D.MEMBER_ID) JOIN COM_INFO E ON(C.COM_NO = E.COM_NO) WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{ userId } AND C.USE_STATUS = 'waiting'
SELECT A.COM_NO , A.RECORD_NO FROM WAITING_RECORD A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{ userId } AND A.USE_STATUS = 'waiting'
SELECT COUNT(A.RECORD_NO) COUNT_RECORD_NO FROM WAITING_RECORD A WHERE A.COM_NO = #{ comNo } AND A.USE_STATUS = 'waiting' AND A.USE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND A.RECORD_NO < #{ recordNo }
